reviewText: I purchased this for my 3 year old who loves trains.  The price was great and ship was quick. It comes with 4 discs and a carry case (even better). My son especially loves the I Love Toy Train dvds.  This set includes I love Big Trains, parts 1,2 and 3 and I Love Toy Trains, The Best of Parts 1,2 and 3 along with 2 other discs.  For the price you can't go wrong, considering one I Love Toy Trains DVD is usually 10.99.
This is a great deal for kids who love trains.  I have a 4 yr old and a 2 yr and it is very entertaining for both of them.  Also great for in the car!!
